disease_explanation: A type of high blood pressure affecting arteries in the lungs and the heart.
diagnosis: blood tests, chest X-ray, or echocardiogram
diagnosis_explanation: These tests evaluate lung and heart function and identify structural abnormalities.

disease_explanation: Chest pain caused by reduced blood flow to the heart.
diagnosis_explanation: A stress test evaluates heart performance under stress, while angiography visualizes blood flow.

disease_explanation: Inflammation of the bronchial tubes leading to coughing and mucus production.
diagnosis_explanation: These tests help assess inflammation in the airways.
